## Checklist

Please ensure all items are checked before submitting:

- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines (see `.editorconfig`)
- [ ] All tests pass locally
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] XML documentation added/updated for public APIs
- [ ] README.md updated (if applicable)
- [ ] CLAUDE.md updated (if architecture changed)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated with changes
- [ ] No breaking changes (or clearly documented with migration guide)
- [ ] Commit messages are clear and descriptive
- [ ] Branch is up to date with `main`
